description: Brawlhalla is a popular free-to-play platform fighting game developed by Blue Mammoth Games. Inspired by classics of the genre such as Super Smash Bros., Brawlhalla pits a variety of unique characters against each other in frantic combat. Players choose legends like Sir Roland, Queen Nai, or Princess Azura and do battle across colorful stages, trying to knock their opponents off the screen. As matches progress, more powerful signature weapons and abilities can be acquired. Brawlhalla features both competitive online multiplayer modes as well as local co-op. It has grown a large global following since its initial early access release in 2014 thanks to its easy to pick up but hard to master gameplay and consistent updates adding new fighters and features. The game remains one of the most played platform fighters today.
